homepage.welcome.message: Welcome to the Trusted Cloud Products and Services Documentation.

homepage.description.message: Our documentation guides you step by step, from basic configuration to advanced use cases, to fully leverage our services while adhering to the highest European compliance standards.

homepage.card1.description.message: Learn to manage your Cloud resources effortlessly with our intuitive and powerful console.

homepage.card2.description.message: Order your first instances, volumes, or services to get started on a secure and high-performance Cloud.

homepage.card3.title.message: Deploy in just a few clicks

homepage.card3.description.message: Launch your first virtual machine in a few simple steps and configure it to meet your specific needs.

homepage.card4.description.message: Create an S3-compatible bucket and integrate access credentials to simplify your storage workflows.

homepage.changeLog.description.message: Find the latest updates and new features. Explore the improvements made to optimize your environments, enhance your management capabilities, and simplify your operations.

homepage.visitWebsite.description.message: Discover all our products and services in detail on our official website.
